title: The Ends Don't Tie with Bunny Rabbits
description: Don’t you wish that things lasted forever? Like love or friendships or dreams? But they don’t—you know it, I know it, and The Ends Don’t Tie with Bunny Rabbits knows it. The end is inevitable, and this collection of short stories shows where you could end up—if you haven’t already. Soul Reapers collect bodies, homicidal women exact revenge on exes, and bigots get their just-desserts.
author: Jeridel Banks
